prompts: Create a Pokemon that has a large flower on its back and is primarily green.
I want a creature that resembles a dinosaur with vibrant colors and a unique plant feature.
Generate a character that embodies nature with both animal and plant characteristics.
Make a Pokemon that evolves from a small bulb into a larger, flower-bearing form.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has a friendly demeanor.
Design a creature that is both Grass and Poison type with a distinctive flower.
Show me a Pokemon that has a mix of blue and green shades, perfect for a forest setting.
